entry.title: The decline of Vosges conifers
entry.content:
During the last year of secondary school in France, students must complete a Travail Personnel Encadré (TPE) in groups of 2 to 4 people. You have to choose a topic and find a problematic.

With two friends, I had to work on the following problematic that you can find in French above on the cover page of our file: “Is the decline of the Vosges conifers still mainly linked to acid rain?”

We were rewarded with a score of 18/20 for this baccalaureate exam.
Download file
entry.summary: During the last year of secondary school in France, students must complete a Travail Personnel Encadré (TPE) in groups of 2 to 4 people. You have to choose a topic and find a problematic.

entry.title: New website!
entry.content:
Today, I’ve decided to create a new personal website starting from zero.

Actually, the old one became quite useless and wasn’t translated. Now I’m able to blog, share other passions meanwhile I present myself throught this website.
entry.summary: Today, I’ve decided to create a new personal website starting from zero.
